mapper.insert: insert into diary (uid, title, intro, img, git_name, git_url, repo_id, is_proj, s_date, e_date) values (#{uid}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{img}, #{gitName}, #{gitUrl}, #{repo_id}, #{isProj}, #{sDate}, #{eDate})
mapper.update: update diary set uid = #{uid}, title = #{title}, intro = #{intro}, img = #{img}, git_name = #{gitName}, git_url = #{gitUrl}, repo_id = #{repoId}, is_proj = #{isProj}, s_date = #{sDate}, e_date = #{eDate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select repo_id from diary where uid = #{uid} and is_proj = true and repo_id is not null
